name: 范書愷
objective: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journal papers. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.
schedule:
Week 1: Course introduction and seminar grouping
Weeks 2-18: Personal and Group Presentation of Academic Journal Papers

Paper presentation is to be scheduled not on a weekly basis and the exact presentation dates and time periods will be announced accordingly.
scorePolicy:
1. Oral Presentations 50%
2. Written Reports 30%
3. Class Participation 20%
materials:
Journal Papers published within most recent 3 years
SCI/SSCI indexed
All the papers published in pure OA journals should not be considered
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
課程是否導入AI: AI2：鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）AI4：簡單介紹 AI 的基本概念（Briefly introduce the basic concept of AI）
